globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src 'self'; img-src 'self'; manifest-src 'self'; script-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self'; style-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self';
globalHeaders.permissions-policy: accelerometer=(), autoplay=(), camera=(), clipboard-read=(), clipboard-write=(), cross-origin-isolated=(), display-capture=(), encrypted-media=(), fullscreen=(), gamepad=(), geolocation=(), gyroscope=(), hid=(), magnetometer=(), microphone=(), midi=(), payment=(), picture-in-picture=(), publickey-credentials-get=(), screen-wake-lock=(), serial=(), sync-xhr=(), usb=()
